title: (4317) Brand New House For Sale, Located At Malabe, Kahanthota Road,
details: Brand New House For Sale, 5 Km from Malabe,Kahanthota Road,(3 Perches Lands) capped Garden, Architectural Design 2 Story House, Above 4000 square feet,Fully Tiled, Timber Stair ways, 5 Bed Rooms, 3 Bathrooms with Modern Fittings, Master Bed Room with attached Bathroom, Pantry Cupboards, Wall Cupboards,Separate Servant Room and Toilets,Parking facilities for 7 Vehicles, Surrounded wall. Separate Stair way for 2nd Floor (2nd floor Can be Separated) Rs : 310 Million / 31 Million
